name: Deep Dive (deep-dive)
description:
Explore, Collect Chests and don't get eaten by the frogfish!

Walk: WASD
Crouch: Ctrl
Jump: Spacebar

Known bugs that aren't really bugs but features:

- Camera Clips through terrain.
- Audio is sometimes too loud or too quiet.
- You can climb everything if you spam spacebar hard enough.
- Frogfishes target you through walls in a 360° radius.

Use Commentsection for Bugreports. TY <3

git repo: https://github.com/sorataoshino/deep-dive/
